long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you an anime fan looking to add some excitement to your browsing experience? Look no further than our Chrome extension that brings a new random anime image to your screen every time you open a new tab. With a vast collection of high-quality images from your favorite anime artists, you’ll never know what surprise awaits you with each new tab. Say goodbye to boring blank tabs and hello to a world of colorful anime characters and breathtaking landscapes.

But that’s not all - our extension is also incredibly easy to use. Simply install it on your Chrome browser and let the magic happen. No complicated settings or configurations - just pure anime goodness at your fingertips. And with regular updates and additions to our image collection, you’ll never run out of new anime surprises. Bored with Anime? Find your favorite jokes in the popup!

So why settle for a dull browsing experience when you can have an exciting adventure with every new tab? Our Chrome extension is the perfect way to add some fun and color to your daily routine. Whether you’re taking a break from work or just need a quick pick-me-up, our extension is sure to brighten your day.
